params.userReputation: The reputation score of the user

returns._0: interestRate The annual interest rate in percentage

params.loanId: The ID of the loan to check

returns.healthFactor: The health factor of the loan

returns._0: Array of loan IDs that are available for liquidation

returns.healthFactor: Current health factor of the loan
returns.interestRate: Interest rate used for the loan

returns.totalLoansIssued: Total number of loans ever issued

returns.totalBorrowed: Total amount borrowed across all loans
returns.totalRepaid: Total amount repaid across all loans

returns.loanIds: Array of loan IDs belonging to the borrower

params.loanId: The ID of the loan to check

returns._0: True if the loan is healthy

params.loanId: The ID of the loan to liquidate

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.loanId: The ID of the loan to repay

params.collateralId: The ID of the NFT to use as collateral

params._baseBorrowRate: The base borrow rate (annual, in percentage)
params._maxBorrowRate: The maximum borrow rate (annual, in percentage)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateInterestRate(uint256).notice: Calculate the interest rate for a loan based on user reputation

checkLoanHealth(uint256).notice: Check the health of a loan

getLoanDetails(uint256).notice: Get comprehensive loan details for frontend

getLoanStatus(uint256).notice: Get loan status for frontend display

getUserLoanStats(address).notice: Get loan statistics for a user

getUserLoans(address).notice: Get all loans for a specific borrower

isLoanHealthy(uint256).notice: Check if a loan is healthy

liquidateLoan(uint256).notice: Liquidate a loan that is unhealthy or past due

requestLoan(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Request a loan using an RWA NFT as collateral
